Description: Three joining fragments from rim of pottery mortarium (top lost). Very light, yellow-greenish, friable clay. Graffito on inside of rim: ]πολ[ retrograde.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (p. 61, pl. XXXII, no. 70)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 645, no. 31)
Villing 2006 / 'Drab Bowls' for Apollo: The Mortaria of Naukratis and Exchange in the Archaic Eastern Mediterranean (no. 6)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (HA.15)
